/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, predominantly beige and brown, are punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green, adding a vibrant contrast to the otherwise monochromatic palette. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a refreshing touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. A few construction cranes can be spotted in the distance, hinting at the city's continuous growth and development. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene and enhancing the overall clarity of the image.
